kickstart.post:
if test -d /opt/modulefiles; then
/bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/applications/netcdf
#%Module1.0 set compiler [expr ! [catch {exec which icc} ignored] ? {"intel"} : \ ! [catch {exec which pgcc} ignored] ? {"pgi"} : {"gnu"}] set netcdfHome /opt/netcdf/$compiler module-whatis "netcdf" module-whatis "Version: 4.0.1" module-whatis "Description: netcdf" module-whatis "Compiler:$compiler Parallel library: none Math Library: none" prepend-path PATH $netcdfHome/bin prepend-path LD_LIBRARY_PATH $netcdfHome/lib prepend-path LIBPATH $netcdfHome/lib
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "4.0.1"
/bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/netcdf/.version.4.0.1 \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/netcdf/.version
/bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/applications/nco
#%Module1.0 set compiler [expr ! [catch {exec which icc} ignored] ? {"intel"} : \ ! [catch {exec which pgcc} ignored] ? {"pgi"} : {"gnu"}] set ncoHome /opt/nco/$compiler module-whatis "nco" module-whatis "Version: 3.9.8" module-whatis "Description: nco" module-whatis "Compiler:$compiler Parallel library: none Math Library: none" prepend-path PATH $ncoHome/bin prepend-path LD_LIBRARY_PATH $ncoHome/lib prepend-path LIBPATH $ncoHome/lib
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "3.9.8"
/bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/nco/.version.3.9.8 \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/nco/.version
fi
